actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Pell with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 52.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution expressing strong support for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization on the occasion of its 40th Anniversary; confirming continued dedication to NATO's founding principle, which is the commitment by democratic nations to their common defense; and urging energetic and cooperative participation by NATO member-states in the development and implementation of joint policies aimed at strengthening the East-West military balance while upholding and promoting democratic values.

summary.text: Expresses support for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) on its 40th anniversary. Reaffirms: (1) continued dedication to NATO as a critical instrumentality for maintaining an effective Western defense of democracy; and (2) that it remains in the interest of all NATO members to resolve recurring disputes concerning defense posture and arms control negotiating strategy in a spirit of comity and compromise.

titles.title: An original resolution expressing strong support for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization on the occasion of its 40th Anniversary; confirming continued dedication to NATO's founding principle, which is the commitment by democratic nations to their common defense; and urging energetic and cooperative participation by NATO member-states in the development and implementation of joint policies aimed at strengthening the East-West military balance while upholding and promoting democratic values.
